question:
Match the following:-

A. Krishnadeva Raya 1. Construction of roads and land reforms
B. Hyder Ali 2. Poems in Telugu
C. Afghans and Turks 3. Mysore Wars
D. Sher Shah 4. Construction of tombs and arches
explanation:
• Krishnadeva Raya Poems in Telugu
• Hyder Ali Mysore Wars
• Afghans and Turks Construction of tombs and arches
• Sher Shah Construction of roads and land reforms
